description: From the name of the German capital city Berlin, where it was invented in the 17th century.

entries.meaning: A four-wheeled carriage with a separate sheltered seat behind the body.
examples: I was then giving some instructions about the forwarding my trunk, and was just going to mount my new purchase in the yard of the inn; when a berlin, apparently belonging to a foreigner of distinction, attended by three French or Swiss servants, drove to the door  [â€¦] .
